kv6.6:5.3: Nibbānaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ accutaṃ amatanti?
kv6.6:7.1: Ākāse pakkhino gacchanti, candimasūriyā gacchanti, tārakarūpāni gacchanti, iddhiṃ vikubbanti, bāhuṃ cālenti, pāṇiṃ cālenti, leḍḍuṃ khipanti, laguḷaṃ khipanti, iddhiṃ khipanti, usuṃ khipantīti?
kv6.6:7.3: Asaṅkhate pakkhino gacchanti, candimasūriyā gacchanti, tārakarūpāni gacchanti, iddhiṃ vikubbanti, bāhuṃ cālenti, pāṇiṃ cālenti, leḍḍuṃ khipanti, laguḷaṃ khipanti, iddhiṃ khipanti, usuṃ khipantīti?
kv6.6:8.1: Ākāsaṃ parivāretvā gharāni karonti koṭṭhāni karontīti?
kv6.6:8.3: Asaṅkhataṃ parivāretvā gharāni karonti koṭṭhāni karontīti?
kv6.6:10.1: Tucchaudapāne pūriyamāne, tucchakoṭṭhe pūriyamāne, tucchakumbhiyā pūriyamānāya ākāso antaradhāyatīti?
